statements: DELETE FROM sensor_data WHERE timestamp < '2021-10-01' AND sensor_type = 'Temperature';
DELETE FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' AND sensor_location = 'Room A';
DELETE FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'temperature' AND value > 100;
DELETE FROM anomalies WHERE data_id IN (SELECT data_id FROM sensor_data WHERE value < 0)
DELETE FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 3 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 5 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM anomaly_records WHERE anomaly_type = 'High Voltage' AND sensor_id = 3;
